title: Reflective Practitioner Mentoring Program for New Higher Education Faculty

context.prior_knowledge: Less than three years of higher education teaching experience or novice instructors
context.additional_context: Providing a flexible learning structure for office/administrative professionals to balance work and study.

learning_goals: Mentoring participants can write reflective practice journals based on the Reflective Practitioner Model five or more times within eight weeks
Participants can complete one collaborative educational innovation project with peer instructors by the end of the semester
Participants can achieve a satisfaction score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in the measured lecture effectiveness survey after 12 weeks
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
